Independent artist blending heartfelt lyrics with atmospheric sounds. Creating music that connects, uplifts, and resonates deeply.

John Taylor

Driven by emotion and fueled by sound. New Album Available Now

Our latest EP, Midnight Machines, is out now on all platforms. Hit play and dive into five tracks of gritty, heartfelt rock.

Buy Digipack
Buy Vinyl
Spotify
Amazon

Creating music that connects, uplifts, and resonates deeply.

Driven by emotion and fueled by sound, this solo artist blends raw storytelling with rich melodies to create a deeply personal and immersive musical experience. With roots in indie, folk, and electronic textures, each track is crafted to resonate with listeners across genres. From intimate acoustic sessions to layered studio productions, the music explores themes of love, loss, identity, and growth. Always evolving and pushing boundaries, this artist invites you to tune in, reflect, and feel something real with every note.

Upcoming Shows

Get ready for a loud summer. We’re hitting major cities across Europe and the US. Check the tour dates and grab your tickets before they’re gone.

  • October 18, 2026 Warszawa, Poland Halle Torwar Halle Torwar Tickets
  • November 7, 2026 Toronto Phoenix Concert Theatre Phoenix Concert Theatre Tickets
  • November 9, 2026 Barcelone, ES Palau de la Música Catalana Palau de la Música Catalana Tickets
  • November 10, 2026 Praha O2 Arena O2 Arena Tickets
  • November 11, 2026 Strasbourg (Ostwald) Le Point d'Eau Le Point d'Eau Tickets
  • November 12, 2026 Zagreb, Croatia Hard Place Hard Place Tickets

Indie Soul

from Montreal
